---
id: 6
title: "Company Secretarial services"
subtitle: Company secretarial services for Company Law, LLP, Foreign Exchange Management Act (FEMA), Software Technology Parks Of India Scheme (STPI), Registrations Under Other Indian Laws
img: "/images/practice-areas/company-secretarial.jpg"
imageBlurUrl: "data:image/jpeg;base64,"
url: "#6"
---

#### Company Law:
- Company Incorporation, ongoing compliances with Registrar of Companies, maintenance of minutes and statutory registers, winding up of companies and related formalities with the office of the Official Liquidator;
- ESOPs, SWEAT Equity Shares and Buy-back of shares;
- Appointment, resignation, removal, fixation of remuneration of directors & auditors
- Drafting of various agreements M&A related documents like shareholder agreements, share purchase Agreements, CCPS, investment agreements etc.
- Pre and Post work related to Mergers, amalgamations and takeovers.
- Petitions before the National Company Law Tribunal/ Office of Regional Director of MCA for various matters like shifting of registered office, compounding of various offences etc.
- Certifications required under Company Law like various compliance certificates, certification of annual returns of listed companies, certifications as required under the listing agreement etc.
- Work relating to creation/ modification/ satisfaction of charges with Registrar of Companies and liaison with banks/ companies/ RoC in connection there with.
- Preparation of instance documents under XBRL, validation, certification and filing of company accounts in XBRL format.
- Secretarial health-check and secretarial audit

#### LLP:
Registration of Limited Liability Partnerships (LLPs) and other related compliances under the Limited Liability Partnership Act, 2008.


#### Foreign Exchange Management Act, 1999 (FEMA):
Compliances with Reserve Bank of India and Foreign Investment Promotion Board with regard to allotment and transfer of shares, repatriations, setting up of business entities in India and abroad and matters connected with it.


#### Software Technology Parks Of India Scheme (STPI):
Registration of new units under STPI scheme, bonding and de-bonding STP units with Customs, regular filings with STPI, closure of STP units, import approvals etc.


#### Registrations Under Other Indian Laws:
Registrations required under other Indian laws like PAN and TAN from Income-tax department, registration under Goods and Services Tax laws (GST) and other registrations under factories act, labour laws, sales tax, VAT etc.
